subject: Order
description_text:
Hi, I placed an order and I can't seem to find any notifications about it.
Like a confirmation email or text.
It'd be under my number 830-481-2747 and this email.
Also, is there anyway to see how long it'll take to arrive? I didn't think
about shipping times from the UK to Texas

conversations.body_text: Hi Conner,      We have added your email address to it. Here is your logistics tracking link.    https://www.fedex.com/wtrk/track/?trknbr=885573341465

Thank you very much

On Wed, Oct 29, 2025, 9:19 PM service@simsonn.com
